text: I feel kinda silly but is it possible to groupby, transform without ungrouping, and then sort by this new column?

elements.text: I feel kinda silly but is it possible to groupby, transform without ungrouping, and then sort by this new column?

text:
there are several ways to do it, but the simplest is I think (I hope I understood correctly what you want):
```combine(groupby(df, cols)) do
    df = copy(sdf)
    # here add a new column
    return sort!(df, :newcolumn)
end```
